summary: On the run with the law on their trail, America's most anguished vampire family heads to England to find an ancient vampire clan. What they find instead could tear their family, and their throats, apart forever.
cast: Cory Knauf|Samuel Child|Mackenzie Firgens|Joseph McKelheer|Ryan Hartwig|Elizabeth Henstridge|Daniel O'Meara|Selina Giles|Sean Browne|Tom Holloway|Sean Cronin|James Lowe|Tammy Minoff|Craig Gellis|Sean Guse|Rocky Abou-Sakher|Johnny Flanagan|Roger Sampson|Ilana Cohn|Brian McGuire|Karyn Bryant|Katharina Gellein Viken|Andrei Alen|Mickey Hope|Jeff Stewart|Ian John-Baptiste|Zoe Grisedale|Essa Zahir|Alexandra Evans|Blayze Collins-Perucchetti|Lynn Doonan|James Rudd|Christina Warren|Kevin De Young|Claire Cameron|Moon Coral|Jayde Angell|Rebecca Calienda|Daniel Brunning|Barry Miller|Chenaie Woolford|Keith Larkin|Mike Burton Phillipson|Richard Ginn|Stuart Chapman|Amelia Southgate|Rowan McAllan|Clay McCall Keeley|Gary Thompson|Julie Vollono|Fabio Vollono|Wilfred Grove|Dominic Kelly|Heather de Young|Eva de Young|Amanda Rudd|Tori Shelley|Dallas Greene|Alexa Niemi|Erik Olson|James Sherwood|Sophie Davis|Chantelle Hughes|Emma Rudd|Victoria Ley
director: Directors: Mitchell Altieri (as The Butcher Brothers), Phil Flores (as The Bucher Brothers)
title: The Thompsons
